  • About

Ruby on Rails Developer

Mid-level web application engineer with professional development experience accross the stack with the Ruby on Rails framework. Hungry to learn new tech in and outside of work, because coding is fun and doesn't get old.

I am a passionate tech nerd who fell down the path of web application development due to its rapidly evolving nature, ability to directly impact the everyday lives of people around the world, and neverending supply of cool and exciting challenges. Starting out with the ASP .NET framework, I eventually became swooned by Ruby on Rails for its superb ease and elegance of developing robust applications.

Beyond the computer screen I am an equally great outdoor adventure nerd. Multiday backpacking excursions through the wild, powdering my hands with chalk to climb a craggy new rock, and catching fish with my teeth like Bear Grylls (just kidding) are just a few of the things I love doing outside.
